actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: Resolution of inquiry into the bombing of Cambodia and Laos, January 20, 1969, through April 20, 1970, by U.S. forces.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense to furnish the House of Representatives with data regarding: (1) the cost in terms of aircraft lost as a result of all bombing and shelling in Cambodia and Laos from January 20, 1969, through April 30, 1970; (2) the number of Armed Forces killed, wounded, captured or missing in action while engaged in such missions between January 1, 1965, and July 25, 1973; and (3) bombing targets during the period January 20, 1969, through April 30, 1970.

titles.title: Resolution of inquiry into the bombing of Cambodia and Laos, January 20, 1969, through April 20, 1970, by U.S. forces.
